title: About the Alpha Client
body: When I go into champ select for either ARAM, Normal 5v5 SR or Ranked SR, I lock in my champion but I can't choose a skin until everyone else has locked in their champion which gives me a few seconds to choose. I'm not sure if it hasn't been implemented in yet but thought that I should just point it out. I also had one issue where I chose a champion with 5 second but it wouldn't choose and me and my friends had to wait because it counted as me dodging. I know it's still in alpha but thought I would just let you know.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm unsure about the first issue, however the second problem sounds like a connection issue.

Are you using a wired or wireless connection?
I have a WiFi range extender which is connected by ethernet cable into my pc. I recently got NBN as well for my internet and don't have many connection issues either.
This sounds like it would be the cause of your issues, could you try connecting your system directly to your router for me, let me know if your issues persist.
